articles.title: EU suspends all security cooperation with Niger in wake of military co - Euronews
articles.description: The US has said it will continue to provide humanitarian aid to the West African country. The European Union will not.
articles.content:
The US has said it will continue to provide humanitarian aid to the West African country. The European Union will not.
